sentences.en: A thin cloud of steam was rising from the spout.
sentences.cn: 喷口处冒出一股薄薄的水蒸气.

sentences.en: Don t spout off big talk.
He replaced the boiler when the last one began to spout flames.
sentences.cn: 原来的锅炉开始往外喷火苗后他便换了个新的。

sentences.en: He used his column to spout ill-informed criticism of the Scots rugby team.
sentences.cn: 他根本不了解苏格兰橄榄球队，却在自己的专栏上对其大加抨击。

sentences.en: I hate it when he spouts off like that!
sentences.cn: 我讨厌他像那样讲个没完！

sentences.en: Little Tony broke the spout off the teapot.
sentences.cn: 小唐尼把茶壶嘴打下来了.

sentences.en: My father was spouting his usual nonsense!
sentences.cn: 我父亲又在没完没了地讲他那些废话了！

sentences.en: Rain from the roof goes down a long spout.
sentences.cn: 屋顶上的雨水从一条漏水的管子中流出来.

sentences.en: She lifted the kettle a little and tilted its spout over the tea-pot.
sentences.cn: 她稍稍提起烧水壶，将壶嘴向茶壶倾斜。

sentences.en: The broken spout on that teapot should be mended.
sentences.cn: 要把那只茶壶的破壶嘴修好.

sentences.en: The ewer is in very good condition with spout restored.
sentences.cn: 喷口修复后，水罐还能用。

sentences.en: The pipe burst and a spout of water shot out.
sentences.cn: 水管破裂了,一股水喷了出来.

sentences.en: The spout is chipped so it doesn't pour very well.
sentences.cn: 这壶嘴儿有个豁口,倒起来不方便.

sentences.en: Their lives have gone up the spout.
sentences.cn: 他们的生活无可挽回地给毁了.

sentences.en: This information the bank sent me is totally up the spout.
sentences.cn: 银行发给我的信息完全不对.

sentences.en: You're the kind of person who affiliates himself with the kind of crap they spout.
sentences.cn: 你这种人就会去附和他们的那些废话。

words.tran_cn: 说话滔滔不绝的人；喷油井
喷射；涌流出来；喋喋不休地说（spout的ing形式）
喷口；水龙卷；水落管；水柱
喷出；喷射；滔滔不绝地讲

phrases.tran_cn: 下水管；雨落管；水落管；出渣槽
无可挽回；在典押中；在困难中

phrases.phrase: up the spout Brit. informal 英，非正式

trans.tran_cn: 喷口，喷嘴，水柱，喷流，（鲸类的）喷水孔，[气]龙卷
trans.tran_en: A spout is a long, hollow part of a container through which liquids can be poured out easily

trans.tran_cn: 喷出； 滔滔不绝地讲
trans.tran_en: to talk a lot about something in a boring or annoying way

trans.tran_cn: 喷出，喷射，滔滔不绝地讲
喷出，喷射，滔滔不绝地讲，把…典当掉
